statements: SELECT * FROM customer_consent WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, consent_date FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT id, consent_date, customer_id FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_given = TRUE ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_given = FALSE AND consent_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS consent_count FROM customer_consent GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, consent_date FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_given = true ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, consent_date FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_given = false ORDER BY consent_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_consents FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_given = true;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(consent_date) AS latest_consent_date FROM customer_consent GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, consent_status, date_given FROM customer_consent;
SELECT consent_status, customer_id, date_given FROM customer_consent;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent;
SELECT log_id, customer_id, consent_status_change, log_date FROM consent_logs;
SELECT consent_status_change, customer_id, log_date, log_id FROM consent_logs;
SELECT customer_id, consent_status FROM customer_consent WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_id, consent_status, date_given FROM customer_consent ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, consent_status FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY date_given ASC;
SELECT customer_id, consent_status, log_date FROM customer_consent LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customer_consent.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id WHERE consent_logs.log_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT customer_id, consent_date FROM customer_consent ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE consent_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT c.name, ct.consent_description FROM customers c JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_types ct ON cc.consent_id = ct.consent_id;

SELECT c.name, ct.consent_description FROM customers c LEFT JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id LEFT JOIN consent_types ct ON cc.consent_id = ct.consent_id WHERE cc.consent_date <= '2021-12-31';

SELECT DISTINCT c.name, ct.consent_description FROM customers c JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_types ct ON cc.consent_id = ct.consent_id ORDER BY c.name DESC, ct.consent_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent;
SELECT customer_id, consent_date, consent_type FROM customer_consent WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, consent_date, consent_description FROM customer_consent ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT ch.history_id, cc.customer_id, ch.action, ch.action_date FROM consent_history ch JOIN customer_consent cc ON ch.customer_id = cc.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent ORDER BY consent_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT consent_description FROM customer_consent WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM consent_history WHERE action = 'update' AND action_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT c.full_name, c.email, ch.action, ch.action_date FROM customer_details c INNER JOIN consent_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id ORDER BY ch.action_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent;
SELECT consent_date, consent_type FROM customer_consent ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_consent_count FROM consent_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT MAX(removal_date) AS latest_removal_date, removal_reason FROM consent_removal;
SELECT consent_type, SUM(total_count) AS total_consent_count FROM consent_statistics GROUP BY consent_type ORDER BY total_consent_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent ORDER BY consent_date DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT consent_type, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM customer_consent GROUP BY consent_type HAVING total_count > 1;

SELECT c.customer_id, ch.consent_date, cr.removal_date FROM customer_consent c LEFT JOIN consent_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id LEFT JOIN consent_removal cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id;
SELECT audit_id, action_type, audit_date FROM consent_audit WHERE action_type = 'REVOKE' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT consent_type FROM customer_consent;
